pr_title: MySQL driver support for JPA/Hibernate in native image

timeline.message:
MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL driver support for JPA/Hibernate.
MySQL integration test added as parallel stage to Jenkinsfile.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL driver support for JPA/Hibernate.
MySQL integration test added as parallel stage to Jenkinsfile.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: This is not very useful - please add ex as parameter to log statement, so we get a stack trace when running in fine or finest log level
timeline.author: tomas-langer

timeline.bodyText:
This seems too complicated.
Maybe extract to method and catch the NoSuchMethodException just once?
timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText:
This will be completely redesigned when I'll be writing native image tests for DB Client. In this case I just wanted to find some working solution to simply run tests in MP application environment and return results.
Next step is to make it jUnit like as much as possible and scan all classes for specific annotated classes/methods so this whole piece of code will be removed.
I'll extract method for now to make it better readable.
replies.author: Tomas-Kraus

timeline.message:
MySQL driver support for JPA/Hibernate. MySQL integration test added as parallel stage to Jenkinsfile.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

MySQL driver support for JPA/Hibernate. MySQL integration test added as parallel stage to Jenkinsfile.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

Added Graal VM and native image profile to test.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

Test initialization and cleanup implemented using BeforeAllCallback, ExtensionContext.Store.CloseableResource
Test execution modified to run both Java VM and native image setups.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

Fixed rebase issue.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

Fixed formating issue.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Kraus <Tomas.Kraus@oracle.com>

Added verify goal to failsafe configuration.
